attributes.action: Condemn the woolich murderers to death
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is to garner the support of those who wish to see those responsible for the brutal murder in Woolich on 22/05/2013 to face the death penalty, publicly, like their poor victim Lee.

Sign this to see that true justice be done and to send a message to other foreign and local extremists.

WE WILL NOT STAND FOR THIS!!
